page.title: 08TRANSPORT IN TREMEIRCHION
page.content: A study of 35 houses in the village of Tremeirchion was carried out by the children of the village school.One questions asked do you own a car,and if the answer was yes what make of car is it:-17 households owned 1 car ,10 households owned 2 cars, 4 households owned 1 cars, 4 households did not own any vehicles and no one owned over 3 vehicles.The most popular makes were British Leyland with 16,Ford with 10, Volks wagon with 5,Vauxhall with 4,Datsun with 3,and Peugot,Mercsedes and Talbot with 2 each. Audi, Mazda, Volvo, Alpha Romeo, Porshe all had 1. The car is an essential part of every day life as the village is situated in the country with a very poor bus service.
